column4: Hallo, i still got problem with internet connection. Maybe i adding ip adressess in wrong way... Please help me someone :D Here is my IP's details in Windows - http://yfrog.com/65networkdetailsp - internet works fine in Windows. And here i added IP's mannually - http://yfrog.com/n6configicp - Internet connection shows that PC is connected, but web browser cant load pages, just shows "loading"...
Maybe i added IP's in wrong way? Please help!!! And sorry for my english :D ^^
that looks like a public internet address, it's very unusual you would add a public internet address to your machine
your windows machine is getting it's ip address by dhcp, you need to do the same with ubuntu, set it to dhcp
